title: If Aurelion sol was a pokemon.
body:
[](https://mir-s3-cdn-cf.behance.net/projects/404/7a917a35188201.Y3JvcCwxMDIxLDc5OCwyNDksMA.png)
He would be palkia
https://67.media.tumblr.com/688bf323fced18444ad3bb7d865b36c8/tumblr_ncspzqPlsi1s5h198o1_500.gif
Because space dragon.

replies.body:
Uh hello space dragon?

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/pokemon/images/b/b3/384Rayquaza_Dream.png/revision/latest?cb=20140126090407
he's ozone dragon

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=55fdnTaj,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-17T21:12:49.017+0000)
>
> he's ozone dragon

No, rayquaza actually goes into space

false, marsh is correct.
Palkia is the only space dragon in the game.
But isn't space in Palkia's theme more dimensional space (like in 'time and space'), unlike Aurelion's which is the extreterrestial space?

Still a better fit than rayquaza who is entirely based on earth with only a few examples of fighting things beyond.

Honestly deoxys is the best fit for theme, but I went with palkia as it shared the dragon theme as well as having the place in extraterrestrial space that rayquaza does not.

my bad, soulsilver says he goes into the ozone. 
It was the only game i read about him in so i got my facts wrong.

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=55fdnTaj,comment-id=0001000000010000,timestamp=2016-07-17T21:18:58.973+0000)
>
> my bad, soulsilver says he goes into the ozone. 
> It was the only game i read about him in so i got my facts wrong.

He lives in the ozone, he travels to space often to fight crime and deoxys.

Must be a newer generation thing. I dropped off after black and white, even then i just shook in my boots over the sunken temple.
i played the games when i was younger and never put a shred of thought into them

> [{quoted}](name=Marshbouy,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=55fdnTaj,comment-id=000100000001000000000000,timestamp=2016-07-17T22:01:56.355+0000)
>
> Must be a newer generation thing. I dropped off after black and white, even then i just shook in my boots over the sunken temple.
> i played the games when i was younger and never put a shred of thought into them

That was in emerald...
it's also in soul siver

he was the OG space dragon...

besides the serpentine body represents him better
I thought so as well, but palkia fits what aurelion does better, and if you check the other posts I've made it ends up being a theme between them.
eh. I think it would be a better ao shin
Garatina all the way
I can actually think of a better fit for giratina
Nocturne?
You will know it it comes time for it.
nah i mean i like giratina more
I don't even know who all these fake Pokemon are. Anything after silver/gold is irrelevant.
